channel.title: Leaving Topic (of Greatness, no less!)
channel.description: Yeh, so I'm leaving or somethin'. I'll still hang around #mopar and MSN if you care to add me, but I've lost interest in RS. Since I've always insisted that this community be focused on RS, it seems hypocritical that I'd stick around after losing interest in the intended focus. Give love on IRC. Everyone loves to be loved in a way they love.

@script_owned4 wrote:

I miss people who I never met before.

item.title: Leaving Topic (of Greatness, no less!)
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

xxlegitxx,
Not his IRC name.
His IRL name.

woooooooooooooooooooooooooot 2 hours, 10 minutes until my name change is official and whatnot SilverLining on wut Ikiliki[God], irl l0l owtf u changing name irl? yeh wtf To what? Hopefully it's like Dick Smurf Or something well, the name sucks so I won't tell you l0l Which is why I was puzzled when we were talking aout this last time But [u]your mom is a cunt[/u], amirite? She wanted you to change it? urrite SilverLining yeh lol, [u]your mom is dumb[/u]
Onise pwnd btw :p

Read full topic

@xxlegitxx wrote:

Didn’t know you too well, sL. And when I did talk to you, you were a dick. So I can’t say I’m sad to see you go.

God of Ikiliki:

So ummh, your changing your IRL name… to what?

IRC?

<3 U

item.title: Leaving Topic (of Greatness, no less!)
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

[quote=“eVokki`, post:8, topic:158219”][quote author=kando2 link=topic=215643.msg1880516#msg1880516 date=1195005020]
Nothing will last forever.

Bye sL never acutally known you that bit but have heard your name alot since I started to explore more about mitb and mscp.
Yet we say good bye to anuthor cool person, and i’m sure everyone will <3 you always!
[/quote]

[/quote]

I lol’d

Bye bye SilverLining. My other comment was too heartless. I love you. RIP <3

Read full topic
